articles.description: Naegleria fowleri can lead to a dangerous infection of the brain that “destroys the brain tissue and is usually fatal.”
articles.content: Health officials in Florida have sounded the alarm over the discovery of a rare, brain-eating amoeba in the county that encompasses Tampa and several other cities. The Florida Department of Health an… [+772 chars]
